title.rendered: Palsons Derma joins hands with Smile Foundation to support girl child education

content.rendered:
Palsons Derma joins hands with Smile Foundation to support girl child education

 

Palsons Derma has join hands with Smile Foundation to extend their support towards Smile Foundation’s initiative for girl child education ‘She Can Fly’. Palsons Derma is supporting girls for their primary education Pan -India by running a campaign ‘Add Glow to Life’.

Palsons Derma is a company based in Kolkata with all India presence which is passionate about Dermatology, has completed 25 years in Dermatology this year.

Palsons Derma is a ISO 9001:2008 certified company, and is also the first company from Eastern India to win the most prestigious and much coveted Quality Excellence Award from IDMA. Palsons’ manufacturing facility in Kolkata is WHO-GMP certified and ISO 22716 certified. Innovation is Palsons Derma’s primary strength and the company dedicates its’ energy and resources to offer solutions to dermatological problems.
